actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to furnish medical and dental treatment for non-service-connected disabilities of veterans over 70 years of age.

summary.text: Authorizes the furnishing of medical and dental treatment for non-service-connected disabilities of veterans over seventy years of age. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 612)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to furnish medical and dental treatment for non-service-connected disabilities of veterans over 70 years of age.
